text: Cheryl Rae Tiegs (born September 25 1947 in Breckenridge, Minnesota) is an American fashion model and actress. She is best known for her modeling for the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. Tiegs has been on the cover of the SI Swimsuit Issue three times. She has also been on the covers of many other magazines. These include Vogue, Glamour, Harper's and Time. Tiegs performed as herself in the sitcom Just Shoot Me. From 1970 to 1979, she was married to movie director Stan Dragoti. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Models from Minnesota Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Cheryl Tiegs
